name: Neutrino
about: The minority always wields more potential as a whole.
lyrics:
Getting out of the 
Prison called life. 
Yes, I know that 
We can make it. 
Let me go 
On the way.

Jumping hard and 
Climbing all heights 
Is a risk, but we 
Can take it. 
Let me go 
On the way. 

We're abundant, yet 
We're underappreciated. 
That's not fair, or is it? 
Down under the 
Shining beauty of 
Everything, we're there to serve them. 

I am a neutrino, oh! 
No topping, no amino, oh! 
No trailing like zero, oh! 
Just existing in parallel. 

Waking up and thinking about 
The very thought of living 
And then panicking and grieving 
All the pain I got. 
Whenever you're needy, 
I be ready for you, baby! 
I can only do so much. 

Come on, AT! Rocking upbeat, over two feet, 
Word on the street, yeah! We heat it like a treat. 
Retreat, never recede. Always be free. 
Big heap of the rich gold, in the whole week. 
There's a whole lot in the jar. 
No, I ain't talking. I'm a superstar. 
Take my warning, she will take you far. 
If you don't know her, she's BIZARRE. 

Abundant, yet 
We're underappreciated. 
We both know that 
We are going to change it. 
Down under the 
Shining beauty of 
Everything, we're there to serve them. 

I am a neutrino, oh! 
No topping, no amino, oh! 
I want to be a hero, oh! 
Just existing in parallel.
